The purpose of this chapter is to provide a brief overview of common traditional practices in self-care used for promoting health, preventing illness, and managing diseases.. In this regard, activities that can be carried out by the individual are generally included. This will  enable or help users  obtain additional information 
on any area of interest. Before embarking on self health care, a relevant expert 
may be consulted for a better and detailed understanding of each practice.
